posts.post_title: FS: T-206 Camnitz (Hands Over Head) Black Lenox - SOLD
posts.post_content:
CARD IS SOLD

Family issue, so I need to liquidate a large portion of my collection, so I'm doing it in reverse order.  No reasonable offer will be refused.  Asking $1000 or best offer.  PayPal only.  Responses in this thread will take precedence over e-mails.
